mapper.select: select * from user inner join student on s_id = user.user_id inner join take on take.user_id = user.user_id where course_id = #{courseId}

select course_id, user_id as teacher_id, username as teacher_name, course_name, description, max_student_number, picture from user, course where course_id in (select course_id from take where user_id = #{studentId}) and (user_id, course_id) in (select * from teach)

select course_id, user_id as teacher_id, username as teacher_name, course_name, description, max_student_number, picture from user, course where (course_name like "%"#{keyword}"%" or description like "%"#{keyword}"%" or username like "%"#{keyword}"%") and (user_id, course_id) in (select * from teach)
mapper.insert: insert into course(course_name, description, max_student_number, picture) values (#{courseName}, #{description}, #{maxStudentNumber},#{picture})
mapper.delete: delete from take where user_id = #{studentId} and course_id = #{courseId}
delete from teach where course_id = #{courseId}; delete from course where course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.select: select * from course where course_id in (select course_id from teach where user_id = #{teacherId})
select course_id, user_id as teacher_id, username as teacher_name, course_name, description, max_student_number, picture from user natural join course natural join teach
select count(user_id) as studentNumberOfCourse, course_id from take group by course_id order by studentNumberOfCourse
